TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")]
[<System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")>]

summary.span: 为特定密钥容器指定访问权限。

span.span: Specifies access rights for specific key containers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限旨在使用户能够在涉及少量密钥时轻松管理密钥容器，或者只向某些密钥授予访问权限。This permission is intended to enable users to easily manage key containers when either a small number of keys is involved, or access is to be granted to only some keys.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A object that contains the cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters.
A bitwise combination of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 参数和访问权限初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters and access permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许将访问权限分配给对象中标识的特定密钥容器 。This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers identified in a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CPP/keycontainerpermission.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CS/keycontainerpermission.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified key container name and access permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你为按名称标识的特定密钥容器指定访问权限;使用星号 ( "\*" ) 来表示所有密钥容器。This constructor allows you to specify access rights for specific key containers identified by name; use an asterisk ("\*") to represent all the key containers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许将访问权限分配给特定的密钥容器。This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers. `keySpec`或 `providerType` 的值为-1，表示所有主要规范或提供程序类型。A `keySpec` or `providerType` value of -1 represents all key specifications or provider types. `keyStore`、 `providerName` 或 `keyContainerName` "\*" 表示所有密钥存储、提供程序或密钥容器。A `keyStore`, `providerName`, or `keyContainerName` of "\*" represents all key stores, providers, or key containers. `providerName` `keyContainerName` `null` 表示所有提供程序或密钥容器的或。A `providerName` or `keyContainerName` that is `null` represents all providers or key containers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CPP/keycontainerpermission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/CS/keycontainerpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermission/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

summary.span: 获取或设置密钥容器权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the key container permissions.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 其中的许多标志功能非常强大，只允许访问只应授予高度信任的代码的密钥容器。Many of these flags are powerful and permit access to key containers that should only be granted to highly trusted code. 最强大的标志包括、、 、、、 和 。The most powerful of the flags are , , , , , , and . 有关使用这些标志引起的特定威胁，请参阅各个标志说明。For specific threats posed by the use of these flags, see individual flag descriptions.

summary.span: 获取或设置密钥容器名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the key container name.
The name of the key container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值 "\*" 可将访问条目应用到指定的提供程序名称和提供程序类型中的所有密钥容器。Use a value of "\*" to apply the access entry to all key containers within the specified provider name and provider type.

exception.span: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.

span.span: One of the AT_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的有效值为 AT_KEYEXCHANGE (1) 和 AT_SIGNATURE () 。Valid values for this property are AT_KEYEXCHANGE (1) and AT_SIGNATURE (2). 默认值为-1，表示所有可能的值。The default value is -1, representing all possible values.

The name of the key store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效值为 "用户"、"计算机" 或 "\*"。Valid values are "User", "Machine", or "\*". 如果 `null` 指定了，则将值设置为 " \* "。If `null` is specified, the value is set to "\*".

The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序名称的一个示例是 "Microsoft 增强的加密提供程序"。An example of a provider name is "Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider". 如果 `null` 指定了，则使用增强的加密提供程序名称。If `null` is specified, the enhanced cryptographic provider name is used.

summary.span: 获取或设置提供程序类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the provider type.

value.span: Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义的 PROV_ 值之一。

span.span: One of the PROV_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为-1，表示所有可能的值。The default value is -1, representing all possible values. Wincrypt.h 头文件定义以下值：The Wincrypt.h header file defines the following values: - \#定义 PROV_RSA_FULL 1\#define PROV_RSA_FULL 1 - \#定义 PROV_RSA_SIG 2\#define PROV_RSA_SIG 2 - \#定义 PROV_DSS 3\#define PROV_DSS 3 - \#定义 PROV_FORTEZZA 4\#define PROV_FORTEZZA 4 - \#定义 PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5\#define PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5 - \#定义 PROV_SSL 6\#define PROV_SSL 6 - \#定义 PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12\#define PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12 - \#定义 PROV_DSS_DH 13\#define PROV_DSS_DH 13 - \#定义 PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14\#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14 - \#定义 PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15\#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15 - \#定义 PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16\#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16 - \#定义 PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17\#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17 - \#定义 PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18\#define PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18 - \#定义 PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20\#define PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20 - \#定义 PROV_RNG 21\#define PROV_RNG 21 - \#定义 PROV_INTEL_SEC 22\#define PROV_INTEL_SEC 22 - \#定义 PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23\#define PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23 - \#定义 PROV_RSA_AES 24\#define PROV_RSA_AES 24

exception.span: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

span.span: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
